title: 树状数组1
content:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define MAX 500001
using namespace std;
ll read(){
    char c=getchar();ll x=0;int f=1;
    for (;!isdigit(c);c=getchar()) if(c=='-') f=-1;
    for (;isdigit(c);c=getchar()) x=x*10+c-48;
    return x*f;
}
ll n,m,x,y,ret;
ll ans[MAX<<1];
void add(int x,ll k){
    while(x<=n){
        ans[x]+=k;
        x+=x&-x;
    }
}
void init(){
    ll temp;
    for (int i=1;i<=n;++i){
        temp=read();
        add(i,temp);
    }
}
ll sum(int x){
    ll temp=0;
    while(x){
        temp+=ans[x];
        x-=x&-x;
    }
    return temp;
}

int main(){
    n=read();m=read();
    init();
    while(m--){
        ret=read();x=read();y=read();
        if(ret==1){
            add(x,y);
        }
        else{
            printf("%lld\n",sum(y)-sum(x-1));
        }
    }
}
